select s.id, u.id as user, u.employee_identification as employee_identification, s.shift, s.date_schedule, concat(u.lastname, ' ', u.firstname) AS name_user, s.editor, s.controller from user u, schedule s where (u.id = s.user)
and (s.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and s.date_schedule <= #{date_to})
and (u.firstname like CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') or u.lastname like CONCAT('%', #{my_full_text_search}, '%') or u.employee_identification = #{my_full_text_search})
